    J. Elías Herrero Jaraba

    (Member, IEEE) received the Ph.D. degree in engineering from the University of Zaragoza.
    Teaching work: has focused on electronics, from its basics to power electronics, including embedded systems.
    Researching: Within the university, he has developed his research in the area of computer vision. And more recently, he has focused his research interests in the field of neural networks and deep learning.
